instructions: On the Home screen, tap Settings . On the Settings screen, tap Personal Hotspot . On the Personal Hotspot screen, turn on the Personal Hotspot toggle switch. Remember the Wi-Fi Password . You'll use this password to connect other devices to this hotspot.

To connect a Mac to the hotspot device, go to the menu bar, select Wi-Fi status , then choose the name of the iPhone or iPad providing the Personal Hotspot. To connect an iPad, iPod touch, or another iPhone to the hotspot device, go to Settings > Wi-Fi , then tap the name of the iPhone or iPad providing the Personal Hotspot. Your third device connects to the hotspot without having to enter the password.
